wikipedia_page.main: Kieran Michael O'Hara (born 22 April 1996) is an Irish professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Scunthorpe United, on loan from EFL League One club Burton Albion and the Republic of Ireland national team.

response: Bywater joined Burton Albion on 13 January 2016, as backup to Jon McLaughlin.Stephen Bywater: Burton sign ex-Derby and West Ham goalkeeper In summer 2017, the Brewers decided to release McLaughlin and Bywater was installed as first choice,RETAINED LIST playing 44 league games in 2017-18, however Burton were relegated from the Championship at the end of the season. Following relegation, Bywater returned to backup status behind loan keeper Bradley Collins, and then another loan keeper, Kieran O'Hara, in the 2019-20 season. Following the signing of Ben Garratt in October 2019, Bywater dropped to third choice, and stopped taking a salary and attending training while remaining available in an emergency.Nigel Clough explains the situation with Stephen Bywater He was released at the end of the season and then announced his retirement.Derby County promotion winner retires following release from club
